main.name: Saadat Taaseen
main.occupation: Full Stack Software Engineer primarily focused on ReactJS, MongoDB, ExpressJS and NodeJS
main.description: Full Stack React Developer by Day, Vocalist/Musician by Night. #ohSaad
main.bio: My name is Saadat. I am a recent Bootcamp Graduate from General Assembly. I excel in frameworks such as React, Node, Ruby On Rails, Firebase and databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL and I have experience building websites with full CRUD and authentication. Before GA, I worked as a Chemist at a Pharmaceutical Company. I realised that there was no growth opportunity in the occupation I was in, and wanted to use my intellect to be able to build a better life for myself, and help others achieve their goals. After I got laid off due the company's financial drought right before the CoVid19 pandemic, I decided to use the quarantine period to learn coding and improve on my skills. I am grateful and proud for being able to step outside my comfort zone and pursue something that I actually enjoy. I'm passionate about coding and love to challenge myself to learn more and improve my skillset everyday.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: I am a recent Bootcamp Graduate from General Assembly. I have experience in frameworks such as React, Node, Ruby On Rails, Firebase and databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL and have experience building websites with full CRUD and authentication.

education.description: Graduated as a Full Stack Developer

work.title: Software Engineering Fellow
work.description:
Completed 18 weeks of Full Stack Web Development training.
Created backend servers to contain RESTful APIs, which can be used by front-end frameworks.
Utilized Model-View-Controller method to build full stack web applications 
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to build a functional website with full CRUD and Authentication 
Accessed multiple third-party-APIs to create a visually appealing website that portrays the information in a cohesive manner.

work.title: Quality Control Scientist
work.description:
Perform various chemical and physical tests such as ‘High Pressure Liquid Chromatography’, ‘Dissolution’ of products in chemical media similar to digestive acids, ‘Infrared Spectrophotometry’ and various other experimental methods to ensure product quality meets the required standards for human consumption. 
 Responsible for proper and immediate documentation of daily activities. 
 Checking specifications to make sure chemicals are ready for release.

work.title: Bookkeeper
work.description: Organized and filed proper documentation for various client corporations. Filed taxes for small private corporations. Worked with clients to ensure correct information during archiving and for future needs. Using all available information to file taxes for the fiscal year for those same clients.

projects.title: Compostrack, Webdesign for easy composting
projects.category: Created this project in a Hackathon with 5 UX designers and an additional developer. Website has Auth, Maps, a database and a working backend.

projects.title: React-Native Image Display
projects.category: My first React Native app. With no prior knowledge on how to create React-Native apps, the goal was to explore the differences in development compared to ReactJS. Full Stack Build

projects.title: React-Music-App
projects.category: This application was created from scratch. The application uses stored data to play music, presented in a beautiful User Experience. Front-End Build

projects.title: JavaScript: Pokedex
projects.category: The project was made with three weeks worth of knowledge of Javascript, and made with only Vanilla JS, HTML and CSS. This was my first project, and I wanted to apply all the information I learned in 3 weeks.

projects.title: CoVid19 Tracker
projects.category: This webpage shows the total cases, daily cases, deaths and recoveries, both globally and by country.

projects.title: Instagram Clone
projects.category: Instagram Clone created using a React front-end and  Firebase for Database and Authentication.

projects.title: Shipt Clone
projects.category: Shipt Clone was created with a group of 3 other develops under strict instructions from a UX/UI developer team. Used the MERN stack to build this application.

projects.title: ReadIt (Social Media Clone)
projects.category: Inspiration taken from Reddit, Website uses full CRUD functionalities and use of Authentication to create and comment on posts. This Project uses React Front end and Ruby On Rails backend.
